title: Add BullBoost Performance clickable image banner on every authenticated page

requirements.summary: Add a persistent clickable BullBoost Performance logo banner on every authenticated page inside the Layout component. The banner displays the uploaded logo image from frontend/public/assets/generated/bullboost-logo.dim_760x200.png and navigates to https://bullboostperformance.com/?ref=xprbexxu in a new tab when clicked. The banner is styled consistently with the app's dark automotive theme and positioned similar to the existing eBay affiliate banner.
acceptanceCriteria: The BullBoost Performance logo image is visible on every authenticated page inside the Layout
Clicking/tapping the image opens https://bullboostperformance.com/?ref=xprbexxu in a new browser tab
The banner does not appear on the unauthenticated landing/intro page
The banner is styled with the app's dark automotive theme, consistent with existing banners
The image is rendered from the static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/bullboost-logo.dim_760x200.png
The anchor tag includes rel='noopener noreferrer' for security

file_operations.description: Add a BullBoost Performance clickable banner between the TopBar and the main content area (before the existing eBay affiliate banner). The banner must render an anchor tag with target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer' wrapping an img element that displays frontend/public/assets/generated/bullboost-logo.dim_760x200.png. The anchor href must be exactly https://bullboostperformance.com/?ref=xprbexxu. Style the banner as a slim clickable strip or card with a dark/asphalt background consistent with the app's automotive theme, using similar styling to the existing affiliate banner. Ensure the banner is non-intrusive but visible, positioned logically within the authenticated Layout flow.
